channel.title: Instead Of Locking The Advertising Topics how about deleting them?
channel.description: Well I've seen some mods and other staff locking the topics that advertise forums and servers.Locking them doesn't do anything except wait for other topic's to get bumped or posted in so that the locked topic gets moved down the list.Instead of locking how about deleting it and sending them a PM about how this is wrong.In my eyes I see it as people can still look at the site or the ip of the thing there advertising.Just a suggestion don't flame me and this section is for moparisthebest.com and moparisthebest.com.
